briefTitle: A Study of Eliglustat Tartrate (Genz-112638) in Patients With Gaucher Disease (ENGAGE)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multi-Center Study Confirming the Efficacy and Safety of Genz-112638 in Patients With Gaucher Disease Type 1 (ENGAGE)
summary: This Phase 3 study was designed to confirm the efficacy and safety of eliglustat tartrate (Genz-112638) in participants with Gaucher disease Type 1.

primaryOutcome.measure: PAP: Percent Change From Baseline in Spleen Volume (in Multiples of Normal [MN]) at Week 39 of the Primary Analysis Period With Eliglustat Tartrate Treatment as Compared to Placebo
